billEvents.eventText: reported referred to ways and means

title: Repeals subdivision 3 of section 117 of the social services law relating to public assistance benefits to or for new residents
summary: Repeals subdivision 3 of section 117 of the social services law relating to public assistance benefits to or for new residents.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1854

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 12, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. WRIGHT, GLICK, ORTIZ, JAFFEE -- Multi-Sponsored
         by -- M. of A. COOK,  LAVINE,  McENENY,  ROBINSON  --  read  once  and
         referred to the Committee on Social Services

       AN  ACT  to  repeal  subdivision 3 of section 117 of the social services
         law, relating to payment of public assistance benefits to or  for  new
         residents

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 3 of section 117 of the social services law  is
    2  REPEALED.
    3    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05680-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 3 of section 117 of the social services law, relating to payment of public assistance benefits to or for new residents
